items.title: Just $16 gets you Anker’s 6-foot 140W USB-C cable that charges two devices at the same time (All-time low)
items.summary:
Anker 6-foot 2-in-1 140W USB-C Cable

Buy for $16 (Reg. up to $26)

What we love

Want to charge two devices from a single USB-C power source? Well, this Anker cable lets you do just that. It splits a single USB-C cord into two with dual Type-C connectors – one input on one end and two outputs on the other. This cable can deliver up to 140W to a single device, or intelligently split power between two devices as needed.
